verses.roman:
āśraya jānite kahi e nava padārtha
e navera utpatti-hetu sei āśrayārtha

synonyms: āśraya—the ultimate shelter; jānite—to know; kahi—I discuss; e—these; nava—nine; pada-artha—categories; e—these; navera—of the nine; utpatti—of the origin; hetu—cause; sei—that; āśraya—of the shelter; artha—the meaning.
translation: "To know distinctly the ultimate shelter of everything that be, I have described the other nine categories. The cause for the appearance of these nine is rightly called their shelter.
